titleStmt.title: The great propitiation, or, Christs satisfaction and man's justification by it upon his faith that is belief and obedience to the gospel endeavored to be made easily intelligible ... in some sermons preached, &c. / by Joseph Truman
titleStmt.author: Truman, Joseph, 1631-1671.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and enlarg'd.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell for R. Clavell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in: Union Theological Seminary Library, New York; National Library of Wales.
